module.name: date_time_assignment
module.purpose: The Date time assignment application module supports the requirement to assign a date or a date and a time with a role to product data.

inscope.li: the assignment of a date with a role to product data;
the assignment of a date and time with a role to product data.

outscope.li: the actual designation of the role in which the date or date and time functions is not specified in this module;
the specification of the role string value is done by modules which use this module.

uof.name: Date_Time_Assignment
uof.description: The Date_Time_Assignment UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of assigning date or dates and times with a role to product data.

aa.refpath: (date_and_time_assignment date_and_time_assignment.role-> date_time_role-> date_time_role.name) (date_assignment date_assignment.role-> date_role-> date_role.name)

usage_guide.description: This clause describes usages of this module. This module shall be used in the context of another module. It may not be used independently.
